Title: Smash the imperialist war conspiracy, forge ahead courageously to build our peaceful and happy life!
Notes: The small caricatures below represent the United States (Harry Truman) and Great Britain (Winston Churchill). Truman holds a 'war plan' (戰争計劃), to the right of Churchill is a 'plan to enslave the Chinese people' (奴役中國人民 的計劃).
